bandwidth-unit.help: Unit of measurement for guaranteed and maximum bandwidth for this shaper (Kbps, Mbps or Gbps).
bandwidth-unit.name: bandwidth-unit

diffserv.help: Enable/disable changing the DiffServ setting applied to traffic accepted by this shaper.
diffserv.name: diffserv

diffservcode.help: DiffServ setting to be applied to traffic accepted by this shaper.
diffservcode.name: diffservcode

exceed-bandwidth.help: Exceed bandwidth used for DSCP multi-stage marking. Units depend on the bandwidth-unit setting.
exceed-bandwidth.name: exceed-bandwidth

exceed-class-id.help: Class ID for traffic in [guaranteed-bandwidth, maximum-bandwidth].
exceed-class-id.name: exceed-class-id

exceed-dscp.help: DSCP mark for traffic in [guaranteed-bandwidth, exceed-bandwidth].
exceed-dscp.name: exceed-dscp

guaranteed-bandwidth.help: Amount of bandwidth guaranteed for this shaper (0 - 16776000). Units depend on the bandwidth-unit setting.
guaranteed-bandwidth.name: guaranteed-bandwidth

maximum-bandwidth.help: Upper bandwidth limit enforced by this shaper (0 - 16776000). 0 means no limit. Units depend on the bandwidth-unit setting.
maximum-bandwidth.name: maximum-bandwidth

maximum-dscp.help: DSCP mark for traffic in [exceed-bandwidth, maximum-bandwidth].
maximum-dscp.name: maximum-dscp

overhead.help: Per-packet size overhead used in rate computations.
overhead.name: overhead

per-policy.help: Enable/disable applying a separate shaper for each policy. For example, if enabled the guaranteed bandwidth is applied separately for each policy.
per-policy.name: per-policy

options.help: All referring policies share one traffic shaper.
options.name: disable

options.help: Each referring policy has its own traffic shaper.
options.name: enable

priority.help: Higher priority traffic is more likely to be forwarded without delays and without compromising the guaranteed bandwidth.
priority.name: priority
